What is the purpose of the `addmultisigaddress` command in Verus?
The `addmultisigaddress` command is used to add a multisignature address to the wallet, requiring a specified number of signatures out of a set of provided keys or addresses.

addmultisigaddress nrequired ["key",...] ( "account" ) Add a nrequired-to-sign multisignature address to the wallet. Each key is a VRSC address or hex-encoded public key. If 'account' is specified (DEPRECATED), assign address to that account. Arguments: 1. nrequired    (numeric, required) The number of required signatures out of the n keys or addresses. 2. "keysobject"  (string, required) A json array of VRSC addresses or hex-encoded public keys   [    "address" (string) VRSC address or hex-encoded public key    ...,   ] 3. "account"   (string, optional) DEPRECATED. If provided, MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error. Result: "VRSC_address" (string) A VRSC address associated with the keys. Examples: Add a multisig address from 2 addresses > verus addmultisigaddress 2 "["RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV","RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV"]" As json rpc call > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "addmultisigaddress", "params": [2, "["RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV","RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV"]"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
./raw_text_input_api_text/addmultisigaddress
What are the required arguments for the `addmultisigaddress` command?

The `addmultisigaddress` command requires two arguments:

1. `nrequired`: The number of required signatures out of the n keys or addresses.
2. `keysobject`: A JSON array of VRSC addresses or hex-encoded public keys.

addmultisigaddress nrequired ["key",...] ( "account" ) Add a nrequired-to-sign multisignature address to the wallet. Each key is a VRSC address or hex-encoded public key. If 'account' is specified (DEPRECATED), assign address to that account. Arguments: 1. nrequired    (numeric, required) The number of required signatures out of the n keys or addresses. 2. "account"   (string, optional) DEPRECATED. If provided, MUST be set to the empty string "" to represent the default account. Passing any other string will result in an error. Result: "VRSC_address" (string) A VRSC address associated with the keys. The optional argument is `account`, which is deprecated and should be set to an empty string (`""`) to represent the default account.

How can I add a multisig address from two addresses using the `addmultisigaddress` command?

You can add a multisig address from two addresses using the following command:
```
verus addmultisigaddress 2 "["RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV","RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV"]"
```
Alternatively, you can use a JSON RPC call:
```
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "addmultisigaddress", "params": [2, "["RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV","RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV"]"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```
